page.title: 08The City Hall
page.content: The City Hall is divided into six rooms.They are the Library,Information Centre,Main Hall,Memorial Hall,the Kitchen and the Council Chambers.The information centre is used by tourists to find out where all the camp sites are and where to go for an enjoyable day out.The main hall is where all the jumble sales are held along with plays and coffee mornings and evenings.At the moment an extension is being built to make the stage bigger for plays.The Memorial Hall is used for W.I. mini markets and for meetings and services. The kitchen is where they make coffee and squash for coffee mornings and the council chambers is where the council hold their meetings.Mr and Mrs Phillips are the caretakers.
